cart.name: Dark Roast Coffee
cart.description: Ground dark roast coffee with a deep, smoky flavor and robust aroma. Perfect for lovers of strong, intense coffee.

cart.name: Arabica Whole Beans
cart.description: Premium Arabica coffee beans with a rich, smooth flavor and a slight acidity. Perfect for espresso or filter coffee brewing.

cart.name: DeLonghi Coffee Machine
cart.description: The DeLonghi semi-automatic coffee machine helps you make the perfect espresso or cappuccino. Sleek design and easy to use.
